title: Joni's Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Surf-shack kitchen in downtown Montauk. Menu has several vegan items, such as the Thai me up, tofu rice-paper roll; bagel with vegan cream cheese; oatmeal and quinoa bowls with choice of rice, soy, almond, hemp, or coconut milk; scrambled tofu wrap. Beverages include smoothies, fresh juices, and coffee.
